item.title: European Competitiveness and Enlargement: Is There Anyone in Charge?
item.description: Pellegrin, Julie. “European Competitiveness and Enlargement: Is There Anyone in Charge?.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy. Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, editors. 297-316. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Economics; Authority; Markets; Political Economy; International Relations; Authority vs Markets Text access (external link)
